title: Client shows ridiculous times spent in-game by friends
body:
My sister has a strange problem with her client where it says that all of her friends have been in-game for ludicrous amounts of time, as shown in the linked image. This problem persists after the game is closed and re-opened, and has been around for awhile. 

Is this a known issue? And is there a way to resolve it?

replies.body:
Hey EJ107,

It looks like your clock is out of sync. On the PC in the screenshot it shows that your computer's clock is set to a 11/04/2016 instead of 10/04/2016. You should be able to solve this by syncing your Windows clock. This [Knowledge Base guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202536660#wq1) will show you how!

I don't know how I missed that! What a silly mistake.

Thank you for the link.

I think we all know the culprit here

https://media.giphy.com/media/HitAab11PjQZO/giphy.gif

"How long can you move in the Stopped Time?!"
